mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOD_BOARD(mID, mTitle, userID, mDate, mContent) VALUES(#{mID}, #{mTitle}, #{userID}, #{mDate}, #{mContent})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS currentDateTime FROM DUAL
SELECT * FROM MOD_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY mID DESC
SELECT * FROM MOD_BOARD WHERE mTitle LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR userID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
SELECT * FROM MOD_BOARD WHERE mID < #{mID} ORDER BY mID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM MOD_BOARD WHERE mID > #{mID} ORDER BY mID ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
